title: Metaverse Could Enrich the Quality of Our Lives
itunes:title: Metaverse Could Enrich the Quality of Our Lives
description:
Herman Narula, CEO of Improbable, discusses his book Virtual Society: The Metaverse and the New Frontiers of Human Experience.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
